title: Textile, possibly 1930s
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: plain weave with supplementary warps (velvet).  Cut pile.  Pattern (in lower height pile) etched into fabric with acid rollers.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 135.5 x 62 cm (53 3/8 x 24 7/16 in.)
Repeat H: 48.3 cm (19 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Design of pomegranate plants in a strong diamond lattice. Deep red.
